4. What benefits does our thorough after-sales service offer to guarantee operational stability?

After purchasing an automatic coil packing line, the real value lies in how well the system performs over time. We provide a robust after-sales service program to ensure your machine operates at peak efficiency. Our service team will help to do installation and commissioning boht online and on-site. Also we are providing the turnkey project solution. From routine maintenance to troubleshooting, our team is committed to supporting your operation long after the installation is complete.

Our service team has resolved 95% of client-reported issues within 24 hours, minimizing downtime and ensuring uninterrupted production. This quick response time is a testament to our dedication to operational stability and client satisfaction.
Regular maintenance is the key to extending the lifespan of your coil packing line and preventing unexpected breakdowns. We offer flexible maintenance plans tailored to your operational needs.
For example, a manufacturing client using our Premium Plan reported a 50% reduction in unplanned downtime, leading to a more predictable production schedule.

Our after-sales services go beyond reactive support. Using IoT-enabled monitoring, we provide proactive solutions to potential issues before they disrupt your operations. Sensors on the machine track performance in real time, sending alerts for maintenance needs or unusual patterns.

This approach has helped clients reduce downtime by up to 30%, saving both time and money. Additionally, our technicians are available for on-site visits and emergency repairs, ensuring a swift resolution to any challenges.
4.4 Dive Deeper: The Value of Continuous Support

Ongoing support is not an expense—it’s an investment in your operation’s stability and growth. Our after-sales services include training sessions, spare parts availability, and regular system evaluations to ensure optimal performance.

5. How does our Automatic coil packing line set a higher standard for safety and regulatory compliance?
5.1 Safety as a Core Design Principle

Safety is at the heart of our design process. Automatic coil packing lines often operate in high-speed, high-pressure environments where safety risks can arise. To address this, our machines are equipped with advanced safety mechanisms that protect both operators and the products being packaged.

For instance, features like emergency stop buttons, protective barriers, and load stability sensors significantly reduce the risk of accidents, creating a safer workplace. One client reported a 40% reduction in workplace incidents after upgrading to our safety-enhanced system.
Our machines are designed to meet and exceed global safety and regulatory standards, ensuring compliance across industries.
By exceeding these standards, we help clients avoid fines, improve workplace safety, and ensure smooth operations.
Our automatic coil packing lines are equipped with multiple layers of safety features, ensuring that operators are protected at all times.

column5: Reduces risk of tipping or misalignment

column2: For example, a steel manufacturer saw a 25% improvement in operator safety metrics after implementing our system, showcasing the effectiveness of these features.
5.4 Dive Deeper: The Long-Term Benefits of Safety

Investing in safety doesn’t just protect your workforce—it also delivers long-term financial and operational benefits. Safer environments reduce downtime, improve employee morale, and minimize legal risks, making safety a critical aspect of operational success.
For instance, one of our clients in the cable industry reported a 20% reduction in insurance premiums due to the improved safety measures implemented with our system.

6. What resources do we provide to ensure smooth and effective integration of our solution?

To ensure seamless integration, we begin with a detailed pre-installation assessment of your facility. Our team thoroughly evaluates your production line, workflow, and space constraints to identify potential challenges and recommend the optimal configuration for your automatic coil packing line.

This proactive approach minimizes disruptions during installation and ensures that the system aligns perfectly with your existing processes. Moreover, we facilitate integration with upstream slitting lines and downstream warehouse systems for a cohesive production flow. Additionally, we support the connection of software and control systems, enabling synchronized operations and enhanced efficiency across your production line.

For example, a client in the cable manufacturing industry achieved a 20% reduction in installation time due to our meticulous pre-installation planning, while also benefiting from a fully integrated and streamlined workflow.
6.2 Training Programs to Empower Your Team

We believe that technology is only as effective as the people operating it. That’s why we provide hands-on training programs for your team, ensuring they are confident and capable of using the new system.
For instance, a steel manufacturer reported a 30% increase in operator efficiency after completing our training program, showcasing the long-term value of proper education.

Integration is just the beginning. Our technical support team is available 24/7 to help you address any challenges that arise post-installation. Whether you need assistance troubleshooting an issue or optimizing the system for better performance, our experts are just a call away.

Additionally, our IoT-enabled systems provide real-time performance monitoring, allowing us to identify and resolve potential issues before they cause downtime. Clients using this feature have reported a 25% reduction in maintenance-related delays.
6.4 Dive Deeper: Resources That Drive Success

The resources we provide aren’t just about solving immediate challenges—they’re about empowering your team and optimizing your system for long-term success. From installation to ongoing support, every resource is designed to ensure a smooth transition and sustained efficiency.
For example, a logistics company avoided $15,000 in downtime costs in the first year by leveraging our IoT monitoring and proactive support.

7. What features make our Automatic coil packing line customizable and capable of supporting your future goals?

Our automatic coil packing lines are designed with a modular and future-ready approach, ensuring adaptability as your production needs evolve. The system features easily adjustable PLC points, scalable modules, and a functional design that allows new capabilities to be seamlessly added to the original framework. Whether you require additional wrapping stations, enhanced sensors, or integration with advanced software, our machines can be effortlessly modified to meet changing demands.

This flexibility extends to the packaging line layout, which can be reconfigured to incorporate additional features, such as weighing systems, printing and labeling, automatic pallet strapping, advanced packaging, AGVs, robot or cranes. This ensures the system can adapt to evolving packaging requirements, supporting both current and future operational goals.

For instance, a client in the aluminum coil industry expanded their system to handle a 25% increase in output while integrating weighing and labeling functionalities—achieving this without replacing the core machinery. This modular approach ensures your investment remains relevant, efficient, and capable of scaling alongside your business growth.
7.2 Customization Options to Meet Unique Needs
We understand that no two production lines are the same. That’s why we offer a wide range of customization options to ensure our systems align perfectly with your operations.
For example, a cable manufacturer saved 15% on packaging materials by customizing the wrapping tension and film type for their unique products.

Our systems are designed to grow with your business. As production demands increase or new technologies emerge, our modular and upgradable designs ensure you stay ahead of the curve without the need for costly replacements.

Additionally, our IoT-enabled systems provide data insights that help you identify opportunities for improvement, making it easier to plan for future growth. Clients who leverage these insights have reported a 20% improvement in production planning accuracy.
7.4 Dive Deeper: How Customization Drives ROI

Customization isn’t just about meeting current needs—it’s about maximizing the return on your investment over time. By tailoring the system to your operations and allowing for future upgrades, we help you achieve long-term value.
For instance, a steel producer extended the lifespan of their system by 5 years by upgrading key components instead of replacing the entire machine, saving them $50,000.

column3: True: Our automatic coil packing lines feature modular designs that can be upgraded to handle higher production demands in the future.
False: Customization options are limited to film type and wrapping speed adjustments.

column2: Our customization options cover a wide range of features, including conveyor integration, IoT compatibility, and adjustable wrapping mechanisms, ensuring the system meets your specific needs.
8. Why is our delivery and installation process designed for ease and efficiency?

Our delivery process is designed to ensure your automatic coil packing line arrives on time and in perfect condition. Through careful planning and collaboration, we work to schedule a delivery window that minimizes disruptions to your operations.

With a global logistics network and real-time tracking, we maintain a 98% on-time delivery rate, ensuring you can plan your installation and production schedules with confidence. Additionally, our packaging ensures that all components arrive safely, reducing the risk of delays caused by damage during transit.
8.2 Efficient Installation That Gets You Up and Running Quickly

Installation is a critical phase of the process, and we prioritize efficiency to minimize downtime. Our experienced technicians handle the setup, calibration, and testing of the system, ensuring it integrates seamlessly into your workflow.
This structured approach ensures your system is operational in as little as 6 days, depending on the complexity of the setup.

To ensure a smooth installation process, we prioritize clear communication throughout. From providing updates on delivery schedules to offering a dedicated point of contact, we keep you informed every step of the way.

Our clients have consistently praised our communication efforts, with 90% of them rating us as “Excellent” in this category. By eliminating uncertainty, we help you plan your operations with greater confidence.
8.4 Dive Deeper: Why Our Process Is Built for Efficiency

Every step of our delivery and installation process has been optimized to save time and reduce potential disruptions. From pre-installation assessments to post-installation support, we take a proactive approach to ensure everything runs smoothly.
For example, a steel manufacturer reduced their installation downtime by 20% due to our detailed pre-delivery planning and on-site expertise.

column3: True: Our delivery and installation process typically takes 2–4 days, ensuring minimal impact on your production schedule.
False: Clients are responsible for setting up and calibrating the system after delivery.

column2: Our experienced technicians handle the entire installation process, from system assembly to final calibration and testing, ensuring a hassle-free experience for our clients.
9. What impact do our success stories have on showcasing the credibility of our solutions?

We believe the best way to demonstrate the value of our solutions is through real-world success stories. By showcasing how our systems have solved challenges and delivered measurable results for clients across industries, we provide tangible proof of our expertise and reliability.

For instance, a global cable manufacturer struggling with inconsistent packaging quality saw a 25% improvement in product integrity during transit after implementing our system. This translated into significant cost savings and enhanced customer satisfaction.
To make our success stories even more relevant, we focus on industry-specific results. This approach allows potential clients to see how our solutions perform in environments similar to their own.

column5: High labor costs for manual wrapping
Load stability sensors and wrapping tension customization

column2: These case studies highlight the versatility of our systems and their ability to deliver results across a range of industries.

Our success stories aren’t just about showcasing numbers—they’re about building trust and credibility. By highlighting the specific challenges our clients faced and the measurable improvements they achieved, we demonstrate our ability to deliver on our promises.

For example, a logistics company handling heavy steel coils reported a 70% increase in operational efficiency after implementing our customized coil packing line. This success story became a key factor in securing partnerships with other businesses in the same sector.
9.4 Dive Deeper: How Success Stories Inspire Confidence

Success stories provide a detailed look at how our solutions perform in real-world scenarios, offering valuable insights for potential clients. By documenting the challenges, solutions, and results, we create a transparent narrative that inspires confidence in our capabilities.

column5: Explains how we addressed the challenge

column2: For instance, a case study featuring a steel producer showed a 25% reduction in material waste, helping us secure additional clients in the same industry.

column3: True: Our success stories feature measurable results, such as a 70% reduction in labor costs for steel manufacturers.
False: Success stories are limited to small-scale operations and do not include high-volume producers.

column2: Our success stories span a wide range of industries and production scales, from small businesses to global manufacturers, demonstrating the versatility and reliability of our solutions.
10. What ensures that our contract terms are clear and flexible to meet your specific needs?

We understand that investing in an automatic coil packing line is a significant decision, which is why we ensure our contract terms are clear and easy to understand. From the initial purchase to ongoing maintenance and upgrades, we provide complete transparency so you know exactly what to expect.

Our contracts are free from hidden fees or confusing clauses, giving you peace of mind throughout the entire process. Whether you’re looking for one-time payment options or customized installment plans, we tailor our agreements to suit your financial and operational requirements. For example, 96% of our clients report satisfaction with the simplicity and fairness of our contract terms.
10.2 Flexible Payment Options and Service Plans
To support your business goals, we offer flexible payment structures and service plans that fit your budget and operational needs.

column5: Align payment schedules with cash flow
Options for monthly or quarterly terms
Up to 5 years of additional coverage

column2: For instance, a client in the aluminum industry opted for a flexible installment plan and extended warranty, allowing them to scale their operations while staying within budget.
10.3 Contracts That Evolve with Your Business

Your business needs may change over time, and our contract terms are designed to adapt accordingly. Whether you want to upgrade your system, add new features, or extend your service agreement, we provide options to accommodate your evolving requirements.

For example, our buyback program allows you to trade in your current machine for a newer model at a reduced cost. This ensures that your investment remains aligned with your long-term goals while minimizing expenses.
10.4 Dive Deeper: Why Transparent Contracts Matter

Transparency in contracts isn’t just about clarity—it’s about building trust and fostering long-term partnerships. When you work with us, you’ll receive detailed documentation outlining every aspect of the agreement, ensuring there are no surprises down the line.

column5: Details all expenses, including hidden costs

column2: For instance, a client in the cable industry praised the transparency of our contracts, which helped them secure internal budget approval faster, enabling them to implement the solution ahead of schedule.

column3: True: We offer flexible contracts that include upgrade options, extended warranties, and installment plans tailored to your needs.
False: Warranty extensions and service agreements are only available at the time of the initial purchase.

column2: Warranty extensions and service agreements can be added at any time, ensuring ongoing protection for your investment as your needs evolve.

Selecting the right automatic coil packing system isn’t just about the machine—it’s about finding a partner who listens to your needs, offers tailored solutions, and supports you every step of the way.

Our solutions combine cutting-edge technology, customization, and a commitment to long-term success. From seamless integration and measurable ROI to flexible contracts and credible success stories, we ensure every aspect of your investment delivers tangible results.

By choosing us, you’re not only investing in high-performance equipment but also gaining a dedicated partner who prioritizes your operational excellence. Let us help you streamline your processes, improve productivity, and achieve sustainable growth with a solution designed specifically for your business.

column4: <h2 class=""text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold tracking-tight text-[#1d1d1f] mb-6"">

column5: We've compiled key FAQs about coil packing lin projects for your convenience. If you don't find your question, call us at +8613951501635 or email info@fhopepack.com.

column1: <!-- FAQ Accordion (Grid Layout: 2 Columns on Desktop) -->
<details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100/50 shadow-sm open:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden"">
<summary class=""flex cursor-pointer items-center justify-between p-6 select-none"">
What warranty coverage is included with the steel coil packing line?

column4: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50"">

column5: Our standard warranty covers the entire steel coil packing line for one year, including critical components and manufacturing defects. We also offer extended warranty packages and lifetime technical support to ensure your automated packaging solution operates at peak efficiency for years to come.

column1: <details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100/50 shadow-sm open:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden"">
<summary class=""flex cursor-pointer items-center justify-between p-6 select-none"">
Is on-site installation provided for international coil packing projects?

column4: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50"">

column5: Yes, we provide comprehensive global support. Our certified engineers travel to your facility to handle installation, commissioning, and staff training. This turnkey service ensures your coil packing machinery is correctly calibrated and your team is confident in operating the system safely. On-site installation service for the international coil packing line projects

column1: <details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100/50 shadow-sm open:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden"">
<summary class=""flex cursor-pointer items-center justify-between p-6 select-none"">
Which coil types are compatible with your slit coil packaging system?

column4: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50"">

column5: Our systems are highly versatile, handling a wide range of materials including cold rolled steel, galvanized coils, stainless steel, aluminum, and copper. By analyzing your specific coil dimensions (OD, ID, Width) and weight, our engineering team customizes the slit coil packaging system to provide secure and damage-free wrapping.

column1: <details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100/50 shadow-sm open:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden"">
<summary class=""flex cursor-pointer items-center justify-between p-6 select-none"">
How does the machine adapt to different coil sizes?

column4: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50"">

column5: The packing line features an advanced PLC control system with a user-friendly HMI interface. Operators can easily select preset programs for different coil specifications. The machine automatically adjusts centering, wrapping tension, and overlap rate, minimizing changeover time and ensuring consistent packaging quality across various sizes.

column1: <details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100/50 shadow-sm open:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden"">
<summary class=""flex cursor-pointer items-center justify-between p-6 select-none"">
What safety features are integrated into the coil packing line?

column4: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50"">

column5: Safety is paramount. Our lines include physical perimeter fencing, safety light curtains, and emergency stop interlocks. We strictly adhere to Lockout-Tagout (LOTO) protocols to protect maintenance personnel.

column1: Deep Dive: Understanding the LOTO Safety System
<details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100/50 shadow-sm open:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden"">
<summary class=""flex cursor-pointer items-center justify-between p-6 select-none"">
How do you handle after-sales support and spare parts?

column4: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50"">

column5: We offer a 24/7 online diagnostic service for immediate troubleshooting, alongside a global network of on-site technicians. We maintain a robust inventory of spare parts for our slit coil packaging systems to ensure rapid delivery, minimizing downtime and keeping your production line running smoothly. Comprehensive Guide to Post-Sales Support & Spare Parts Managemen

column1: <details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100/50 shadow-sm open:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden"">
<summary class=""flex cursor-pointer items-center justify-between p-6 select-none"">
What is the typical throughput speed of the system?

column4: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50"">

column5: Our high-speed automatic steel coil packing lines can process between 30 to 40 coils per hour. However, the exact rate depends on your specific coil dimensions and the complexity of the wrapping requirements. We optimize the cycle time to match your upstream production pace.

column1: <details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100/50 shadow-sm open:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden"">
<summary class=""flex cursor-pointer items-center justify-between p-6 select-none"">
Is customization available for specific facility layouts?

column4: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50"">

column5: Absolutely. We engineer custom solutions tailored to your factory's footprint and workflow. Options include L-shaped or U-shaped layouts, added conveyor lengths, and integration with auxiliary stations like weighing, strapping, and labeling modules.

column1: See Case Study: Customized Automated Lines
<details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100/50 shadow-sm open:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden"">
<summary class=""flex cursor-pointer items-center justify-between p-6 select-none"">
Can this system integrate with our existing ERP or MES?

column4: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50"">

column5: Yes, our Industry 4.0-ready packing lines are designed for seamless data exchange. They can connect upstream with production lines and downstream with warehouse management systems (WMS) or ERP software, enabling real-time tracking, data logging, and automated labeling.

column1: Learn More: Steel Coil Packaging line Integration
<details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100/50 shadow-sm open:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden"">
<summary class=""flex cursor-pointer items-center justify-between p-6 select-none"">
Do you provide end-to-end turnkey solutions for service centers?

column4: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50"">

column5: Yes, we specialize in complete turnkey projects. From the initial slitting system to the final automated coil packing line and warehousing, we deliver a cohesive, fully automated workflow that maximizes throughput and reduces labor costs.

Hay la mejor máquina de embalaje para bajar el coste de trabajo para la pipa de PVC, tubo de ppr, tubo upvc.","Envolvedora de manguera,máquina de embalaje de manguera ,envoltura de","Envolvedora de manguera,máquina de embalaje de manguera ,envoltura de la bobina de la manguer","0","/ES/products",,"0","0",,"envoltura de la bobina de la manguera

column2: FHOPE tiene una serie diferente de enrolladoras de bobinas de manguera que se utilizan para bobinar mangueras, empaques de tubos de plástico, que es con una alta eficiencia y un embalaje agradable para ahorrar mano de obra y costos de materiales. Adopta material de embalaje como película de PE, papel, LLDPE, HDPE tejido. La mayor velocidad de empaquetado es hasta 15seg / bobina. Hay diferentes soluciones adoptadas para tubos de HDPE, tubos de PVC ...
Tres tipos de solución de empaquetado de la bobina de manguera:
1. Manguera vertical y envoltura de la bobina de tubo
2. Manguera horizontal y envoltura de la bobina de tubo
3. envoltura automática de la bobina de tubo y manguera

Actualmente, el empaque de Fhope fabrica una línea completa de línea de empaquetado de mangueras, empaquetado de bobinas de tubería ... La línea de empaquetado de bobinas de tuberías y mangueras puede enrollar automáticamente la máquina, transportarla y envolverla. El embolsado automático de la bobina está disponible también. Ahorra el costo de mano de obra en gran medida. El embalaje de Fhope también fabrica máquinas de sellado para encoger y envolver bobinas.

La máquina es impermeable, a prueba de polvo, a prueba de herrumbre, anticorrosivo, anti-aging efecto. Y proteger con eficacia el funcionamiento normal de la máquina. Este diseño no sólo ayudará a ahorrar el trabajo, guardar su espacio de almacén, mejorar su productividad, pero también decorar su producto eficazmente.

Hemos establecido un alto estándar para todo el proceso, desde ingenieros mecánicos a hombre de las ventas. Solo le ofrecemos el mejor producto y el mejor servicio. Hoy en día, refugio siempre continúan diseño confiable rodamiento de máquinas, que pueden resistir todos los desafíos posibles, incluso el ambiente más áspero y duro. Refugio le ayudar con soluciones de línea de envasado completa teniendo en los diferentes mercados y aplicaciones con la última tecnología.

column3: LEARNING COIL PACKING MACHINE BY ITEMS
1. What Is The Best Packaging Method For My Coil?

In coil packaging solutions, choosing the right orientation is essential for ensuring efficiency and safety during transport and storage. The packaging industry primarily uses two coil orientations: vertical and horizontal. Each orientation serves different types of coils, meets specific wrapping needs, and fits various material handling situations. Knowing the differences and advantages of each orientation helps businesses choose the best method. This improves their packaging processes and keeps their products safe.

column5: The coil's inner diameter (ID) faces the wall while the coil stands upright during wrapping, typically employed for economical solutions. This packing method is used for coils loaded by rolling in and out, forklifts, or cranes. Moreover, it provides better stability during transportation, reducing the risk of damage or accidents. Vertical type packaging is typically more straightforward and faster to implement, making it a popular choice for businesses aiming to optimize their packaging process while minimizing costs.
Know more vertical type coil wrapping: Just Here

The horizontal orientation features the coil's inner diameter (ID) facing upwards during the wrapping process. This method is particularly well-suited for automatic coil packing machines, coil packing lines, and special coils, such as copper and hoses. Horizontal wrapping offers several advantages, including improved packaging for irregularly shaped coils, lightweight coils, and coils with small IDs. This orientation is also beneficial when dealing with delicate or sensitive materials that require extra care during the packaging process. By providing a more uniform wrapping and enhanced support for the coil, the horizontal method can lead to better product protection and safer handling throughout transportation and storage.
More horizontal coil wrapping machine information.

column3: 2. What Kind Of Packaging Materials Available For Coil Wrapping?

Various coil packing materials are available to suit the diverse needs of different coil packages and companies, ensuring adequate protection and optimized performance during transportation and storage. The choice of packaging material plays a significant role in determining the overall durability, appearance, and cost-effectiveness of the packaging process. Here are some typical packing materials for coil packaging, along with their unique features and applications:

column5: Stretch film, commonly made from low-density polyethylene (LLDPE), is a versatile and cost-effective material that provides a sealed packaging for coils. With good tension control and sufficient overlap, it can offer excellent water and moisture resistance, making it a popular choice for various industries. Stretch film is also easy to apply and remove, contributing to a more streamlined packaging process.

The strength of the paper is weak, so the original paper cannot be used for coil wrapping. But after reinforcement treatment with PP belts, PE film covering, the paper works for steel coil, wire coil, copper coil...packaging. After packaging with paper, the surface of the package is wear-resistant. Also, the paper provides the VCI formula that is for moisture-proof packaging for seaworthy packages or rainy season packages.

High-density polyethylene (HDPE) or polyethylene (PE) films are non-adhesive materials with a thickness of more than 50 microns. These films provide effective protection against scraping, ensuring that the packaged coil's surface remains damage-free during handling and transportation.

Woven knit belts are typically made from polypropylene (PP) and are flexible yet stronger than paper and film. Their durability makes them popular for packaging razor wire, steel coil, and wire coil products. Woven knit belts protect coils from scrapes during transportation and can be customized to accommodate various coil sizes and shapes.

column3: 3. How To Choose Machine Per Coil Size?

The ring is one of the most important parts of the coil packing machine. The packing material is fixed/stored on the ring for eye through wrapping. The ring size varies from the package size. If the package size range is large, for compatibility, the ring will be designed for the largest coil, which works for smaller coils. The ring rotates at high speed, so the ring material and structure design is very important to ensure it runs for a long time.
4. How To Choose The Machine Matches To My Coil Handling Way?

It is important to choose the proper coil packing machine. The machine version needs to be designed to fit the handling methods used in your factory. There are various handling methods depending on the coil weight and size, such as manual loading for light products, conveyor loading for connecting with the production line, crane loading for heavy products, and forklift for coil moving...

column4: Choose the proper solution per package

The packaging reduces corrosion, water spots, dust, and rust, protecting the coil's surface during storage and transport. Explore our full range of coil packaging options, including sizes, speeds, and materials, and find the perfect solution for your needs.

Choose by product, like wire coil wrappers or hose wrapping machines, or by industry to meet your specific packaging requirements. Fhope offers comprehensive coil packing solutions for any size, from small ID coils to heavy, large ones, handling up to 35T coils. Local services including installation, commissioning, and training are available.
For specific needs, Fhope provides customized solutions, from semi-automatic to fully automatic systems that include coiling, wrapping, strapping, handling, and stacking to meet your packaging goals.
The ultimate guide to the coil wrapping machine

1. What is a coil wrapping machine? +

column7: The coil wrapping machine is a specialized piece of equipment designed for wrapping various coil-shaped products with different types of packing materials. That is a kind of eye through ring wrapper. It provides secure and efficient packaging for a range of industries. MORE INFO

column6: 2. What are the various packing materials compatible for coil wrapping? +

column7: The machine provided by FHOPE can accommodate various packing materials, including stretch film, paper, PP knit belts, PVC film, and HDPE film. FHOPE providing customzied solution per different packing material if your packing material not in above range.

column6: 3. Does the machine capable of managing different sizes and dimensions of coils? +

column7: Yes, the machine designed by our team allows to handle various coil sizes and dimensions, offering flexibility for different applications and industries. FHOPEGROUP had provided coil packing solution from Min. coil OD:60mm to Max.Coil OD:6500mm. Our team will help to do semulation and provide the best solution per your coil packaging.

column6: 4. What can I expect in terms of the lifespan? +

column7: The life expectancy of a coil stretch wrapping machine varies depending on factors like usage, maintenance, and quality of the components. Proper care and regular maintenance can significantly extend the machine's lifespan upto 15+ years.

column6: 5. What factors should I consider when selecting a suitable wrapping machine for my coil package? +

column7: Consider factors like coil dimensions, packing material, required wrapping speed, and budget when choosing the right coil wrapping solution. Consult with our team to ensure the machine meets your specific needs.

column6: 6. What is the cost of packing materials for a single coil wrapping process? +

column7: The cost of packing materials for one coil wrap depends on following points: 1. the type and quantity of the material used; 2. the coil size in OD x ID xWidth; 3. overlapping rate. Consult with the manufacturer or supplier for accurate cost estimates.

column6: 7. What steps should be taken if the machine experiences an issue? +

column7: If the machine encounters a problem,checking the manual and trouble shooting list firt. making a recorder by photos&videos that shows the problem and contact our service team for technical support and troubleshooting assistance. Most machine equipts the remote control moudle, our team will help to check the machien status asap online. In some cases, on-site support or replacement parts may be necessary.

column6: 8. Are there specific spare parts you would recommend for the machine? +

column7: Yes, it is advisable to keep essential spare parts on hand to minimize downtime. Consult with the manufacturer for a list of recommended spare parts.

column6: 9. Can you describe the operational process for the coil packing? +

column7: Loading the coil, start the machine: The coil will be wrapped by the chosen packing material around the coil-shaped product through an eye-like structure. The length of the packing material will be cuculation by PLC. And it will be automatic cutting by cutter. More information for coil packing steps:

column6: 10. Does it needs the special training for operator to start the coil packing? +

column7: Usually, the simple training is ok. The machine designed for easy operation.It was designed in fool style operating machine for non skiled worker. Simple training and user manuals are typically provided to ensure a smooth experience. Most machine packing and delivery without dismentling, only depacking and power connecting required to running the machine.

column6: 11. What is the proper procedure for maintaining and cleaning the machine? +

column7: Regular maintenance and cleaning, as per the manufacturer's guidelines, are crucial for optimal performance and longevity. This may include inspecting, lubricating, and cleaning various components. MORE INFO FOR MAINTENANCE

column6: 12. What after-sales support and warranty options can I expect? +

column7: After-sales support and warranty terms vary among manufacturers. Ensure to inquire about these details before purchasing the machine. After service for coil wrapping machine

column6: 13. Is it possible to obtain a customzied wrapping machine per my coil size? +

column7: Yes, we offer custom-made coil wrapping machinery that matches to specific requirements. Consult with the manufacturer to discuss your needs and explore available options.

column6: 14. What is the typical price for a packing machine for my products? +

column7: The cost of the machine depends on factors like features, coil size, Max.loading, speed capabilities, and customization. Contact with our team for a detailed quote based on your requirements. Price list reference

The ring rotating in high speed so the ring material and sturcture design is very important to make it running in long time.

column8: HOW TO CHOOSE THE PROPER COIL PACKING MACHINE

column7: There are coil wrapping machines with different version vary from packing goal. The best way to find the proper packing solution is Choosing The Machine By Application.If you are packing hoses, check out our list of hose coil packing machines. We offer packing solutions that range from semi-automatic to fully automated, designed to handle various sizes, packing materials, and methods. Any special requirment, you can email or call our team directly for a free consultation.

column9: Click Your Products For Packing Solution

Wondering how to pack your coils more efficiently and save labor? You might have many questions. Before deciding, it's good to explore all the coil packaging options for your product. Below, we detail various methods and types of machines for coil packaging. Solutions vary by coil size, handling method, and factory layout. This will give you a complete overview of the coil wrapping machines available in the market.

column2: Master Steel Coil packing machine & Master steel coil stretch wrapper

The master steel coil stretch wrapper, manufactured by Fhope, is a versatile packing machine that can handle a variety of packing materials, including VCI stretch film, paper, PP, and PE for master coil. Designed to work with stainless steel coil mill, aluminum coil, and wire rod, this machine plays a critical role in large coil packing lines.

column1: Fhope has also provided a comprehensive automatic coil packing system that includes other key equipment such as the coil car, manual packing station, and strapping machine, ensuring a high level of safety and efficiency in the coil packing process. With Fhope's expertise in coil packing technology, customers can be assured of the reliability and quality of their equipment. Whether it's for industrial or commercial use, the master steel coil stretch wrapper and the complete packing system provided by Fhope are ideal solutions for coil packaging needs.

column1: ""headline"": ""Master Steel Coil Stretch Wrapper & Packing Machine"",

""text"": ""A versatile stretch wrap system designed for large master coils, including steel, aluminum, and wire rod coils. It supports multiple film types—including VCI, paper, PP, and PE—and integrates into full coil packaging lines with high protection and efficiency."" :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}
""Orbital wrapping with two blocker roller stations for secure placement and orbital motion wrapping."" :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1},
""Supports various materials: VCI film, paper, PP, PE—ideal for corrosion protection and surface decoration."" :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2},
""Automated diameter scanning via sonar sensor and PLC control adjusts shuttle trolley speed accordingly."" :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3},
""Options for automatic film reloading, edge protection, and fully automated packaging cycles."" :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}
""Load the coil onto blocker roller station (via crane, coil car, fork, etc.)."",
""Wrapper trolley auto-positions and aligns via sensors."",
""Set automatic vs. manual mode; enter coil dimensions on HMI."",
""U‑type orbital ring adjusts height and begins eye-through wrapping."",
""Film overlap, tension, and cutting handled automatically."",
""Upon wrapping completion, shuttle moves to the next station and the coil is offloaded."" :contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}
""High protection—dustproof, corrosion-resistant, and aesthetically wrapped coils."" :contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7},
""High efficiency and consistency—automated scanning and wrapping improve throughput."",
""Versatile—handles steel, aluminum, and wire rod master coils."",
""Safety—motorized positioning, sensors, and soft-start mechanisms enhance protection."" :contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8}

""description"": ""Includes blocker rollers, guide rail, U‑type orbital arm, hydraulic system, shuttle trolley, mechanical film hand, and Siemens-based PLC automation—designed for jumbo aluminum coils up to 30 tons."" :contentReference[oaicite:9]{index=9},

column2: Steel Coil Packing Machine: Flexiable Efficiency Equipment For Heavy Coil
Are you struggling with high labor costs, inconsistent packaging quality, or rust damage during ocean freight? Manual packing is slow and risky.

column1: FHOPE's Steel Coil Packing Machine series is engineered to solve these challenges. Whether you handle slit coils, copper coils, or heavy-duty steel master coils, our technology ensures a tight, waterproof, and professional package every time.""

",,"/uploads/coil-packing/Steel-Coil/FPC-400/xt/STEEL-COIL-PACKING%20MACHINE-FPC-400.jpg","/uploads/coil-packing/Steel-Coil/FPC-400/xt/STEEL-COIL-PACKING%20MACHINE-FPC-400.jpg","https://www.fhopepack.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/Steel-coil-wrapping-machine2025.webp","/uploads/Big-pic/Master-coil-packing-machine-line.jpg","/uploads/Big-pic/Coil-packing-machine-by-film-and-paper.JPG",,,"Industry-Leading Steel Coil Packing Machines","Secure Your Coils, Reduce Labor Costs, and Boost Efficiency with FHOPE’s Steel Coil Wrapping Machine Solutions.","https://www.fhopepack.com/videos/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/automatic-coil-packing-line2025.mp4","

column3: Knowledge Base

column4: Answers to common questions about steel coil wrapping machine technology, safety, and operational efficiency.

column1: <details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100 open:shadow-md transition-all duration-200"">
<summary class=""flex justify-between items-center cursor-pointer p-6 list-none select-none"">

column4: What defines a high-performance steel coil wrapping machine?

column3: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50 pt-4"">

column5: A high-performance steel coil wrapping machine is characterized by its ability to deliver consistent tension control, high throughput speed, and material efficiency. Our systems utilize advanced PLC controls to automate the wrapping process, ensuring every coil receives uniform protection against moisture, dust, and mechanical damage during transit.
Key features often include automatic film cutting, adjustable ring height for various coil diameters, and integration with upstream slitting lines.

column1: <details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100 open:shadow-md transition-all duration-200"">
<summary class=""flex justify-between items-center cursor-pointer p-6 list-none select-none"">

column4: Can the machine handle different coil sizes and materials?

column3: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50 pt-4"">

column5: Yes. FHOPE's wrapping solutions are engineered for versatility. Whether you are packaging steel coils, copper strip coils, aluminum, or wire coils, the machine parameters (ring speed, roller speed, film tension) can be adjusted via the HMI touch screen.
Our machines accommodate a wide range of dimensions: from small slit coils (ID: 508mm) to large master coils (OD: up to 2000mm+), ensuring flexibility for service centers processing diverse orders.

column1: <details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100 open:shadow-md transition-all duration-200"">
<summary class=""flex justify-between items-center cursor-pointer p-6 list-none select-none"">

column4: What packaging materials are compatible with automatic coil packers?

column3: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50 pt-4"">

column5: Our automatic coil packing machines support multi-layer wrapping to meet specific transport requirements. Compatible materials include:

column6: LLDPE Stretch Film: For dust protection and load stability.
VCI Film/Paper: Essential for anti-corrosion protection (rust prevention) during ocean freight.
Woven Fabric/HDPE: Provides superior mechanical protection against abrasion and impact.
Kraft Paper: An eco-friendly option for surface protection.

column1: <details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100 open:shadow-md transition-all duration-200"">
<summary class=""flex justify-between items-center cursor-pointer p-6 list-none select-none"">

column4: How does an automated packing line improve safety?

column3: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50 pt-4"">

column5: Manual coil packing involves heavy lifting, sharp edges, and repetitive strain risks. Automating this process with a coil packing line removes operators from the hazard zone.

Our systems feature safety fencing, light curtains, and emergency stops compliant with CE and ISO standards. By handling heavy coils via conveyors, trolleys, or down-enders, the risk of workplace injury is significantly reduced while operational speed is increased.

column1: <details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100 open:shadow-md transition-all duration-200"">
<summary class=""flex justify-between items-center cursor-pointer p-6 list-none select-none"">

column4: Is custom engineering available for unique factory layouts?

column3: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50 pt-4"">

column5: Absolutely. We understand that floor space is a premium asset. Our engineering team provides custom layout design to integrate the packing line seamlessly into your existing facility.
Whether you need an L-shape, U-shape, or linear configuration, or require integration with specific overhead cranes or forklifts, we tailor the solution to maximize your workflow efficiency.

""overview"": ""The wire coil packaging machine wraps protective material around wire coils using an eye‑through method. It supports paper, film, knitted belt, and other customizable materials based on coil size and weight, offering automatic, even, and tight wrapping for maximum protection."",
""operation"": ""Coil is placed on support rollers; packing material is fed through the coil’s center; automatic functions achieve efficient and precise wrapping."",

column6: The wire coil packaging machine is a type of wrapping machine designed to cover packing material around a wire coil using an eye-through method. The machine is typically used in industries that manufacture wire coils for various applications. The process involves placing the wire coil on the machine's supportive roller  and wrapping a protective layer of packing material around it by feeding the material through the coil's center.

column1: The wire coil wrapping machine can use various packaging materials, including paper, film, and knitted belt, which are customized based on the steel wire product's size and weight requirements.

Automatic functions ensure even, tight application of the packing material at an efficient rate. By optimizing the wrapping material and process for each product, the machine delivers maximum protection for wire coils of all specifications.
By considering your needs and drawing on our extensive industry experience, we offer tailored solutions for every customer.

column2: The PLC and HMI in the wire coil packaging solution enable automatic operation while allowing users to control and modify packing machine parameters through the control system interface. Any errors are displayed on the interface, providing real-time feedback on the coil wrapping process.

column1: With extensive experience and a proven track record, FHOPE designs and manufactures a wide range of steel wire coil compression, wrapping, and strapping machines. We offer customized solutions to meet unique customer requirements, including strapping with PET or steel belt, logo tapping, weighing, stacking, and more. FHOPE provides both semi-automatic and fully automatic options to maximize efficiency and cost-effectiveness, reducing power and material costs.

column2: How We Help You to Make the Best Choice for a Wire Coil Wrapping Machine

When it comes to choosing the ideal wire coil wrapping machine, the decision isn’t just about purchasing a piece of equipment—it’s about securing the future of your production process. The right machine can enhance efficiency, reduce waste, and ensure long-term reliability. But selecting the best option from the sea of available choices can feel overwhelming, particularly when so many factors—functionality, cost, safety, and service—come into play.

I’ve been in your shoes, standing at the crossroads of an important investment decision. It’s a moment when every detail counts, and you need a partner who can guide you with clarity, precision, and trust. That’s where we step in.

Our wire coil wrapping machines are not just tools—they’re solutions designed with your production challenges in mind. They’re built to adapt, excel, and deliver measurable results. But more than that, we don’t just sell machinery. We provide expertise, guidance, and a partnership that ensures you get the most out of your investment.
We empower you to make the best choice for a wire coil wrapping machine by offering solutions tailored to your needs, backed by functionality, reliability, and future-ready technology.
1. How Our Wire Coil Wrapping Machine Meets the Demands of Your Production Process?
1.1 Built to meet diverse production needs

Every production line is unique, and your wire coil wrapping machine needs to address your specific challenges while enhancing efficiency. That’s why our machines are engineered with versatility in mind. Whether you're handling lightweight wire coils or heavy-duty industrial spools, our equipment is designed to adapt.

For example, a manufacturer in the telecommunications industry came to us with a challenge—they needed a machine capable of wrapping delicate wire coils without damaging their integrity. By customizing the tension control system and adding soft-start mechanisms, we provided a solution that not only protected the coils but also increased their wrapping speed by 25%, boosting overall productivity.

Our machines come equipped with features like customizable wrapping speeds, automated film cutting, and programmable settings. These capabilities ensure that every coil, regardless of size or weight, is wrapped consistently and efficiently, minimizing the risk of damage during storage or transit.
1.2 Efficiency and precision that drive measurable performance

Efficiency isn’t just a buzzword—it’s a necessity in today’s competitive manufacturing environment. Our wire coil wrapping machines are built to reduce downtime, minimize material waste, and increase throughput.

Claim: We empower you to make the best choice for a wire coil wrapping machine by offering solutions tailored to your needs, supported by transparency, adaptability, and proven results.

Choosing the right wire coil wrapping machine isn’t just about the equipment—it’s about investing in a partnership. By focusing on functionality, cost-effectiveness, compliance, and long-term support, we ensure your machine isn’t just another tool on your production line but a solution that drives measurable success.

From delivering cutting-edge features to providing robust after-sales support, we’ve built a reputation for helping businesses achieve their goals with confidence. With transparent contracts, flexible options, and real-world case studies that prove our impact, we’re not just helping you buy a machine—we’re equipping you to make a decision that secures your future.
Let us be the partner that helps you achieve seamless production, measurable ROI, and sustainable growth. Together, we’ll ensure your investment pays dividends for years to come.

column1: ","
<section class=""fhope-faq-wrapper w-full bg-white font-sans text-[#1d1d1f] antialiased"">

column3: Technical Support
<h2 class=""text-3xl sm:text-4xl font-bold tracking-tight mb-4 text-[#1d1d1f]"">

column4: In-depth answers regarding our steel wire packing machine capabilities, maintenance, and integration.

column1: <details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100 open:shadow-md transition-all duration-200 open:border-gray-200"">
<summary class=""flex justify-between items-center cursor-pointer p-6 list-none select-none"">

column4: What makes your steel wire packing machine suitable for high-speed production?

column1: <span class=""text-[#0071e3] transition-transform duration-300 group-open:rotate-180 flex-shrink-0""> <!-- Chevron Down Icon -->

<svg class=""w-5 h-5"" fill=""none"" stroke=""currentColor"" viewbox=""0 0 24 24"" xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/2000/svg""><path stroke-linecap=""round"" stroke-linejoin=""round"" stroke-width=""2"" d=""M19 9l-7 7-7-7""></path></svg>

column3: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50 pt-4"">

column5: Our steel wire packing machine is engineered with a high-speed ring drive system and synchronized rollers. This allows for overlapping wrapping at speeds up to 15-20 seconds per coil (depending on size). The integration of servo motors ensures precise tension control even at maximum velocity, preventing wire breakage while maintaining throughput continuity.

column1: <details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100 open:shadow-md transition-all duration-200 open:border-gray-200"">
<summary class=""flex justify-between items-center cursor-pointer p-6 list-none select-none"">

column4: Can the wire coil wrapping machine handle both small and large ID coils?

column1: <span class=""text-[#0071e3] transition-transform duration-300 group-open:rotate-180 flex-shrink-0""> <svg class=""w-5 h-5"" fill=""none"" stroke=""currentColor"" viewbox=""0 0 24 24"" xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/2000/svg""><path stroke-linecap=""round"" stroke-linejoin=""round"" stroke-width=""2"" d=""M19 9l-7 7-7-7""></path></svg>

column3: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50 pt-4"">

column5: Yes. Versatility is core to our design. The wire coil wrapping machine features adjustable shuttle gaps and roller spacing. This allows it to accommodate a broad range of specifications, from small ID (Internal Diameter) galvanized wire coils to large OD (Outer Diameter) PC strand coils, without requiring complex mechanical tool changes.

column1: <details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100 open:shadow-md transition-all duration-200 open:border-gray-200"">
<summary class=""flex justify-between items-center cursor-pointer p-6 list-none select-none"">

column4: Is the wrapping material customizable for the steel wire packing machine?

column1: <span class=""text-[#0071e3] transition-transform duration-300 group-open:rotate-180 flex-shrink-0""> <svg class=""w-5 h-5"" fill=""none"" stroke=""currentColor"" viewbox=""0 0 24 24"" xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/2000/svg""><path stroke-linecap=""round"" stroke-linejoin=""round"" stroke-width=""2"" d=""M19 9l-7 7-7-7""></path></svg>

column3: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50 pt-4"">

column5: Absolutely. The machine is compatible with various packing materials to suit different transport needs. You can use:

column6: VCI Film: For anti-corrosion protection during sea freight.
LLDPE Stretch Film: For dust and moisture sealing.
Woven/Knit Belt: For superior mechanical protection against abrasion.

column1: <details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100 open:shadow-md transition-all duration-200 open:border-gray-200"">
<summary class=""flex justify-between items-center cursor-pointer p-6 list-none select-none"">

column4: How does the wire coil wrapping machine integrate with existing production lines?

column1: <span class=""text-[#0071e3] transition-transform duration-300 group-open:rotate-180 flex-shrink-0""> <svg class=""w-5 h-5"" fill=""none"" stroke=""currentColor"" viewbox=""0 0 24 24"" xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/2000/svg""><path stroke-linecap=""round"" stroke-linejoin=""round"" stroke-width=""2"" d=""M19 9l-7 7-7-7""></path></svg>

column3: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50 pt-4"">

column5: Our wire coil wrapping machine supports standard industrial communication protocols (Profinet, Ethernet/IP). It can be seamlessly linked with your upstream wire drawing machines or downstream automatic stacking systems (down-enders), creating a fully automated, unmanned ""End-of-Line"" packaging solution tailored to your factory layout.

column1: <details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100 open:shadow-md transition-all duration-200 open:border-gray-200"">
<summary class=""flex justify-between items-center cursor-pointer p-6 list-none select-none"">

column4: What safety features are included in the steel wire packing machine?

column1: <span class=""text-[#0071e3] transition-transform duration-300 group-open:rotate-180 flex-shrink-0""> <svg class=""w-5 h-5"" fill=""none"" stroke=""currentColor"" viewbox=""0 0 24 24"" xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/2000/svg""><path stroke-linecap=""round"" stroke-linejoin=""round"" stroke-width=""2"" d=""M19 9l-7 7-7-7""></path></svg>

column3: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50 pt-4"">

column5: Safety is paramount. The machine includes CE-compliant safety fencing, interlocking doors, and safety light curtains that immediately halt operation if breached. Additionally, the soft-start and soft-stop functions of the frequency inverter protect both the operator and the heavy wire coils from sudden mechanical jerks.

column1: <details class=""group bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100 open:shadow-md transition-all duration-200 open:border-gray-200"">
<summary class=""flex justify-between items-center cursor-pointer p-6 list-none select-none"">

column4: Does the wire coil wrapping machine require frequent maintenance?

column1: <span class=""text-[#0071e3] transition-transform duration-300 group-open:rotate-180 flex-shrink-0""> <svg class=""w-5 h-5"" fill=""none"" stroke=""currentColor"" viewbox=""0 0 24 24"" xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/2000/svg""><path stroke-linecap=""round"" stroke-linejoin=""round"" stroke-width=""2"" d=""M19 9l-7 7-7-7""></path></svg>

column3: <div class=""px-6 pb-6 text-[#86868b] leading-relaxed border-t border-gray-50 pt-4"">

column5: We design for durability and low maintenance. The wire coil wrapping machine uses self-lubricating bearings and a modular ring design that minimizes wear parts. Routine maintenance is simplified through easy-access panels and HMI-guided diagnostics that alert operators to specific service needs, ensuring maximum uptime.

column1: 143,"139","1","50","Copper coil packing machine","/Copper-coil-packing-machine","1","index.html","0","6","-1","0","0","{style}/index_shop.htm","{style}/list_shop_v1.htm","{style}/article_shop.htm","{typedir}/{M}{D}{aid}.html","{typedir}/index_{page}.html","default","Copper coil packing machine providing tilter, conveyor,wrapping for coopper industry which providing idea packing for coils...to improve speed.","Copper coil packing machine, coil wrapper,copper packing machine, copper wrapping machine,copper wra","Copper coil packing machine|Copper strip wrapping machine|coil wrapper","0","/Products","143","0","0",,"<h1 style=""text-align:center;"">

column2: COPPER COIL AND COPPR STRIP PACKING MACHINES

column1: In the copper industry, there are many type proucts is in the coil form. Such as copper tube, copper wire, copper sheet, copper strip... Fhope providing efficiency copper coil packing machine per different packaging goal. The major solution is the coil wrapping machine for abobe copper coils packaging with paper, film, stretch film by eye through packaging.

column2: Also Fhope providing the automatic copper packing solution to hlep our customer automation the step at the end of the production line. Our goal is to help the copper coil packing machine user can be huge benefits to the machine packing and automation system handling--and new technology is making it easier than ever to automate more steps of the copper packaging process.  Description:

The FPC series is a coil stretch wrapper type machine specially designed for packaging copper materials. It is mainly suitable for packaging copper wire, copper coil, cable coil, steel coil and so on. The advantages of this kind machines are 100% efficient and perfect packaging appearance, saving labor cost and improving product competitiveness. Fhope group is committed to developing innovative ways to improve each step of the packing line: conveying, lifting,tilting ,wrapping and reducing defective rate of it.

column1: ""description"": ""The FPC series is a coil stretch wrapper specially designed for packaging copper materials (wire, coil, cable, even steel). It ensures perfect, efficient, and labor-saving packaging via eye‑through wrapping using paper, film or stretch film."",
""automation_goal"": ""End‑of‑line automation integrating conveying, lifting, tilting, wrapping to reduce defects and enhance competitiveness.""

""description"": ""Automatic copper coil wrapping line; horizontal wrapping, high packaging effectiveness; uses PLC & HMI, conveyor feeding, fault alarms, tension control, wear‑resistant rollers; supports dual‑material synchronous wrapping.""
""description"": ""Horizontal type packing solution for copper coils; easy operation; excellent product protection.""

""description"": ""Specialized machine for packing copper coils (20 mm–200 mm width); vertical model with optional HMI, dual-language display, indicator lamps, automatic error display, one‑ or two‑layer wrapping, auto‑cutting.""

""description"": ""Versatile machine for wrapping external coils (copper, steel, pipe, wire); horizontal type using paper, woven, PE, stretch film; highlights easy operation, inverter‑adjustable ring and roller speed, conveyor stacking, alarms, adjustable overlap and tension, PU‑covered contact surfaces.""

""description"": ""Integrated system with tilter, conveyor, wrapping machine, down‑ender; optional stacker & pallet wrapper; automates from production line to warehouse; supports PE, stretch film, paper; designed for unmanned operation with flexible vertical or horizontal configuration.""

""description"": ""Complete handling & packing line: coil infeed, PET/PP eye‑through strapping, wrapping (HDPE, paper, stretch film), stacking; managed by PC; enhances speed, protection, manpower reduction, allows weighing, labeling, tracking.""
""seo_keywords"": [""copper coil packing machine"", ""FPC series"", ""automatic copper coil wrapper"", ""copper tube coil packaging line"", ""coil stretch wrapper copper""],
""message"": ""Contact us for customized copper coil packaging solutions and automation upgrades."",

column1: ""description"": ""FHOPEPACK offers durable, high‑efficiency vertical and horizontal coil wrappers for plastic pipes, corrugated pipes, hose coils, PEX, HDPE, and more. These rugged machines are designed to withstand harsh environments and enhance packaging reliability and industrial competitiveness."",
""Easy, fool‑proof operation – even for unskilled operators"",

""description"": ""Vertical type wrapping machine for hose coil, PEX pipe, PE pipe, corrugated pipe, HDPE plastic pipe; designed for smaller to medium‑size coils with high efficiency and tight packaging.""
""description"": ""Vertical hose coil wrapper optimized for lightweight plastic hose packaging—efficiency and easy operation.""
""description"": ""Built with solid cast aluminum rotating ring and polyurethane driving wheels for durable pipe wrapping.""
""description"": ""Automated solution for counting, aligning, bundling, and strapping multiple pipes for factory-level bundle packaging.""
""description"": ""Bag packing system for plastic pipes and bundles (PPR, PVC, PE), ideal for creating minimal‑damage, tidy bundles.""
""Inverter control for ring and roller speeds"",
""Online/offline pipe bundling and bagging line including counting, feeding, aligning, strapping, and bagging modules"",
""Horizontal orbital wrapping machines for long pipes, profiles, rods with customizable bundle sizes""
""Adjustable wrapping speed and overlap via inverter"",
""message"": ""Contact us for customized pipe coil packaging solutions and automation consultation."",

One of supplier can do cable winding machine to coiling to wrapping modified per specification...","Cable packing machine,cable wrapping machine,cable coiling and wrapping machine, cable coiling mchin","Cable packing machine|Cable wire coil wrapping machine|cable coiling machine","0","/Products","259","0","0",,"<h1 style=""text-align:center;"">

column2: Cable packing machine | Cable coil wrapping machine;

column6: Fhope Group delivers customized semi-automatic and fully automatic cable

column1: packaging solutions tailored to diverse industrial needs. Our automated
lines streamline the entire process—from cable counting, coiling, and
winding to final packing—completing cycles in 15-25 seconds with
adjustable speed controls. Using versatile materials like stretch film
and PVC, we optimize space efficiency and reduce labor costs while
ensuring precision. Engineered for seamless integration into production
lines, our systems combine innovation with affordability, addressing
eco-friendly packaging demands. Backed by expert engineering and 360°

column1: ""description"": ""Fhope delivers customizable semi‑automatic and fully automatic cable packaging solutions tailored to diverse industrial needs. Our systems streamline the full cycle—from cable counting, coiling, and winding to final packing—with high efficiency and adjustable speed controls, typically completing cycles in 15–25 seconds."",
""Use of versatile materials: stretch film, PVC"",
""description"": ""Efficient and visually appealing packaging of cable coils; part of the FPCW series.""
""description"": ""Designed for cable coils with minimum ID of 90 mm; supports high‑speed eye‑through wrapping.""
""description"": ""Highly efficient, easy-to-maintain cable coil packaging solution.""
""description"": ""Specialized for large-sized cable coils; supports two-layer wrapping using stretch film, paper, or woven material.""
""description"": ""Advanced system for automatic cable length calculation, coiling, and cutting; can include wrapping.""
""description"": ""Efficient, cost-saving cable coil packaging line with optional wrapping.""
""description"": ""High-speed coiling and banding with strapping—up to 60 pieces per hour, 99% success rate.""
""description"": ""Efficient system for wire cables, electric cables, cable shrinking, and strapping.""
""description"": ""All‑in‑one automated process: winding and packing in one machine.""
""model"": ""Automatic Cable Wire Winding and Packing Line"",
""description"": ""Optimizes cable handling by automating winding, bundling, and packaging.""
""description"": ""Horizontal-type cable packing machine for small-ID cables (>= 90 mm), streamlined design, supports eye‑through film wrapping."",
""PLC & HMI control, compatible with production lines"",
""Adjustable ring and roller speeds via inverter"",
""message"": ""Contact us for tailored cable packaging solutions and automation consultation."",

Tyre Packing Machine | Tyre Packing line
The FPT series tire packaging machine is mainly used in the packaging of the tire, as well as the hose reel, tube roll, etc. The advantage is that it is efficient, saving labor and material cost.

The machine is waterproof, dustproof, rustproof, rust-proof, anti-aging effect. And effectively protect the normal operation of the machine. This design will not only help you save labor, save your warehouse space, improve your productivity, but also decorate your product effectively.

There are different tyre packing machine versions via tyre size, weight...

column1: ""description"": ""The FPT series tire packaging machine uses an eye‑through wrapping technique to efficiently wrap tyres (and hose reels, tube rolls). It delivers high speed (up to 15 sec per piece), labor and material cost savings, and improved productivity, while protecting products from dust, moisture, and damage. The machine is waterproof, dustproof, rustproof, and anti‑aging."",

""description"": ""Designed for lightweight tyres (e.g., motorcycle, bicycle) with cylinder holder and support rollers to prevent shaking during wrapping. Semi-auto and auto modes, adjustable ring and roller via inverter.""
""description"": ""Motorcycle tyre packaging; lightweight duty; prevents shaking; similar features to FPT‑100 with larger capacity.""

""description"": ""Efficient horizontal tyer packing with improved appearance; includes rotating ring, ring reset, automatic material cutting, adjustable overlap, guardrails, soft start/stop, tension control, alarms, logo taping.""
""description"": ""Automatic packaging for large tyres and rolls; eliminates need for manual packaging; robust solution.""
""description"": ""Integrates horizontal wrapper, information reading, conveying, and palletizing; supports automation, material auto-exchange, and tailored to space and size requirements.""
""description"": ""Online horizontal wrapper for bundling tyres; auto conveyor infeed/outfeed, film feeding & cutting, OD full‑sides wrapping; supports different tyre OD simultaneously.""
""Touch screen control (on some models, e.g., FPT‑300)"",
""Customizable for different tyre sizes and weights""
""message"": ""Contact us for custom tyre wrapping automation and consultation."",

column2: Hose Wrapping Machine | Hose Packing Sloutions

column1: FHOPEPACK providing different series hose coil wrapping machine used to hose coil, plastic pipe packaging, which is with highly efficiency and nice packaging for saving labor and material cost. It adopts packing material as PE film, paper, LLDPE, HDPE woven. The higher packing speed is upto 16sec/coil. There are different solution adopted to HDPE pipe, PVC PIPE...
Three types hose coil packing solution:
1. Vertical hose and pipe coil wrapper
2. Horizontal hose and pipe coil wrapper
3. Automatic hose and pipe coil wrapper

Currently Fhopepack manufacturing a full online of hose packaging line, pipe coil packaging...Pipe and hose wrapping machine can automatically coiling the machine, conveying, wrapping. Automatic coil bagging is available too. It saves the labor cost greatly. Fhope packaging also manufactures sealing machines for coil shrinking and wrapping.
a. Adopting world famous brands for main components.
b. Safe Guardrails equipped for object loading and unloading.
c. Inverter for adjusting Wrapping Ring speed and Rolls speed.
d. Different kinds of packing material can be using on machine.
e. Independent electrical cabinet and with trouble-shooting for safe operation.

column4: Manual hose packing is the bottleneck of your production line.

column1: It's time to replace labor shortages with engineering precision.

Check length. Coil. Wind. Strap. Wrap. Stack. FHOPE provides a comprehensive, end-to-end packaging ecosystem.
<div class=""rounded-[2rem] overflow-hidden shadow-2xl bg-white p-2 border border-slate-200"">

column6: What is a Hose Coil Packer?
It is the ultimate protection for your product. Designed to wrap hose and pipe coils efficiently using Stretch Film, PE Film, or Paper.
The system consists of a Ring Station for wrapping, a Control Console for management, and an Applicator for precise material tension.

column2: <h2 class=""text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold text-center text-[#1d1d1f] mb-12"">

column1: <summary class=""flex justify-between items-center font-bold text-xl text-[#1d1d1f] list-none hover:text-[#0071e3] transition-colors"">
What is a hose packaging machine?

column4: It is an automated industrial solution that coils, straps, wraps, and palletizes hoses. It replaces manual labor to ensure consistent package quality and higher production speed.

column1: <summary class=""flex justify-between items-center font-bold text-xl text-[#1d1d1f] list-none hover:text-[#0071e3] transition-colors"">
How does the automatic coiling work?

column4: The machine connects to your extruder or production line. It automatically feeds the hose, winds it into a neat coil based on your set diameter, and cuts it once the length is reached, preventing tangles.

column1: <summary class=""flex justify-between items-center font-bold text-xl text-[#1d1d1f] list-none hover:text-[#0071e3] transition-colors"">
Is the machine customizable?

column4: Yes. We tailor the machine to your specific hose dimensions (ID/OD), coil weight, and preferred packing materials. We also integrate with your existing ERP/MES systems.

column1: <summary class=""flex justify-between items-center font-bold text-xl text-[#1d1d1f] list-none hover:text-[#0071e3] transition-colors"">
What is the typical lead time?

column4: Depending on the customization level, standard lead times range from 4 to 8 weeks.

""Inverter control for ring and roll speed adjustments"",

""description"": ""Uses stretch film, HDPE, woven material to provide moisture- and dust-resistant packaging for plastic coils.""

Fhope developed the automatic coiler and automatic winding system designed for pipe and hose, cable wire... The atuomatic coiler can abe deisnged for most kinds of plastic pipes and hoses.By changing manual or semi-automatic mold and with the help of automatic winding & cutting system, the system can help customers reduce labor cost and improve production procession in packaging speed .Fhope's automatic coiling machine is very simple and convenient to operate, so even workers who have not operated it before can quickly master it. In order to meet the various needs of different customers, we have customized a variety of packaging solutions for customers. We have designed an automated packaging line to meet the needs of small diameter films. Don't worry about the difference between the coil and the machine, our automatic winding and strapping machine can solve these problems. In addition, we will adjust the configuration of spools, coils and packaging materials through special packaging and processing.

column2: Autoamtic coiling and strapping machine for hose & pipe

Automatic pipe coiling machine and strapping machine manufactured by Fhope is a automatic pipe winding system which includes automatic coiler and hose strapping machine. The system can be deisnged for different size plastic pipes and hoses.By changing manual or semi-automatic volume, with the help of automatic winding system, we can help customers reduce labor cost and improve product packaging speed .This type machine is easy to operate and easy for worker to master it. In addition, we have also customized and designed various wrapping solutions for our different  customers. For example, we also designed the automatic packaging line for small diameter film.Even though these coils and machines have different range features, similar to our automatic volumes and strapping machines.In these cases, we can use special packaging and processing to convert spooling, packaging materials and coil configuration.

column1: <h4 aria-controls=""collapseExample"" aria-expanded=""false"" class=""section section-collapse closed"" data-toggle=""collapse"" href=""#case-sealer"" role=""button"">

column3: 1. the coiler automatically and continuously winds pipes into coils of the precise size, quantity and shape required. This ensures a professional, high-impact presentation and prevents damage, uneven winding and crop failure compared to manual coiling. Tightly wound coils also allow for greater stacking heights during storage or transit.

column1: 2.  the coiler eliminates the need for manual winding and significantly reduces labor costs. It can operate continuously for up to 20 hours a day with minimal downtime, increasing productivity and throughput. Manual winding is tedious, time-consuming and represents ergonomic hazards.

3.  the coiler applies polypropylene strapping bands around coiled pipes to securely lock them together. Straps prevent coils from loosening, splitting or unraveling, even under heavy loads. They provide a durable yet releasable solution and allow coils to be individually removed as needed.

column2: Fhope 上海风鼎机械专注于定制半自动和全自动的电缆包装解决方案，以满足不同客户的不同需求。自动电缆包装线，可完成一个完整的包装过程，从电缆长度计数、电缆卷线、电缆缠绕和自动电缆包装。采用拉伸膜、PVC等材料，可提供不同类型的电缆线圈包装解决方案。
包装机可以在15-25秒内完成一个线圈包。环的速度和转速可以由逆变器调节。在生产中，它是连接生产线上自动包装的最有效的设备。通过自定义设计，该机器满足了节省空间和节省包装成本的要求。
Fhope为电缆线圈和电缆线圈市场提供包装解决方案。我们对电缆包装机的奉献，带来了创新的、廉价的产品，解决了诸如减少、非自然包装等问题。我们的收入、设备服务、客户工程和服务部门可以帮助您为您的个人软件设计最好的防御性产品包装系统。欢迎您与我们联系Fhope电缆包装设备。我们的团队将帮助您找到最优秀的机器，以完美地满足您的规格。
总而言之，我们为电缆线圈的盘绕、包装、捆扎、收缩和堆跺包装解决方案提供了全面的解决方案。

column2: 托盘缠绕包装机

column1: 作为一家专业从事拉伸包装机、托盘包装机的中国供应商，设计制作了特种拉伸包装机械FHEW系列拉伸包装机。汇集了全自动切膜送料技术和丰富的拉伸包装机制造经验，为您提供了一款深受市场欢迎的转盘拉伸包装机。
我们的设备被设计和生产，即使在最苛刻的条件下也能完美地工作。此外，我们的托盘拉伸包装机安装容易，笨拙的工作风格，操作方便，维护需求少，提供了良好和良好的张力保护包装包装。拉伸包装机因其高效、耐用的特点，深受广大客户的欢迎。中国制造供应商Fhope的一系列包装机，您的产品的包装好帮手。

column3: FHOPE拥有不同系列的管材缠绕包装机软管线圈包装机，用于软管线圈，塑料管道包装，具有高效率和良好的包装，节省人力和材料成本。它采用包装材料作为PE膜，纸张，LLDPE，HDPE编织而成。更高的包装速度高达15秒/卷。 HDPE管，PVC管...可采用不同的解决方案...
三种类型胶管缠绕包装解决方案:
目前Fhope包装公司生产全系列软管包装生产线，管道缠绕包装生产线。管道和软管卷材包装生产线可以自动卷取机器，输送，包装。自动卷纸装袋也可用。它大大节省了人力成本。 Fhope包装公司还生产用于卷材收缩和包装的封口机。

column2: 包装概念是卷材包装机设计的组成部分。该机器在线圈的所有表面上放置一层紧密的薄膜。这层紧密的薄膜消除了包装中的大部分空气。通过减少包装中的空气量，降低了形成水分的可能性，从而降低了腐蚀或水斑的可能性。

column2: FHOPE作为线圈包装行业的领导者，提供高质量的机器来帮助您的包装过程。我们结合您的需求和丰富的经验为每位客户提供独特的服务。
线圈数据和规格手动输入到控制中心和系统。该参数包含以下相关信息：
PLC和HMI帮助机器自动运行，通过控制系统，用户可以轻松控制和修改信息。所有发生的错误都会显示在界面上，让用户更清楚地看到进度。
Fhope在设计和制造各种线圈压缩，缠绕和捆扎包装机方面拥有丰富的经验和良好的信誉。我们为不同的客户提供不同的解决方案以满足他们特殊和独特的要求通过PET或钢带捆扎，标识攻丝，称重，堆叠....所有类型的机器将为我们的客户提供整洁和完美的包装。我们还为客户提供半自动和全自动选项，高效率和成本效益将节省电力和材料成本。
